thread.title: Listen to Yo-Yo Ma's Rendition of The Simpsons Theme
thread.title_full: Listen to Yo-Yo Ma's Rendition of The Simpsons Theme

author: TV Guide
title: Listen to Yo-Yo Ma's Rendition of The Simpsons Theme
text: Posted Oct. 12, 2015 at 1:47 PM Updated at 3:00 PM Posted Oct. 12, 2015 at 1:47 PM Updated at 3:00 PM The Simpsons got classical on Sunday's episode. Not only did Yo-Yo Ma make a cameo as himself in the episode -- to help Mr. Burns serenade Mrs. Bouvier -- but the renowned cellist performed the show's theme song, which played over the closing credits. Take a listen: Asked on Twitter how the show nabbed Ma, executive producer Al Jean said, "We asked and he said yes; lucky us." @DavidNgLAT @TheSimpsons We asked and he said yes; lucky usâ€” Al Jean (@AlJean) October 12, 2015 Other Links From TVGuide.com
